original_title: Season of TXT: Midsummer - TOMORROW X TOGETHER (TXT)
overview: Season of TXT: Midsummer is a summer package consisting of a vlog and photobook showcasing TOMORROW X TOGETHER (TXT)'s summer vacation as well as the members partaking in a photoshoot and behind the scenes footage of the photoshoot. It was released on September 7, 2022.
title: Season of TXT: Midsummer - TOMORROW X TOGETHER (TXT)
